Header.title: We are a Landing Page
Header.paragraph: The rural-urban education divide 68% of indian population lives in rural india, so the rural education is of utmost important

About.paragraph: Kalyani Devi College of Education KDCE (Trust) is a West Bengal based non-profit organization dedicated to the education of childern with a particular focus on empowering girl childern, and aim to providing opportunities for skill aquisition and growth of young generation of the society
About.title: Kalyani Devi College of Education KDCE (Trust) is a West Bengal based non-profit organization dedicated to the education of childern with a particular focus on empowering girl childern, and aim to providing opportunities for skill aquisition and growth of young generation of the society

Features.paragraph1: To promote and impart knowledge, promote moral and spiritual values, inspire creativity and establish social awareness.
Features.text2: To initiate, establish and maintain a college/institution for imparting education, conducting research, planning, evaluating, developing and enhancing knowledge and understanding in the field of health care and pharmacy industries.
Features.text3: To create and enhance opportunities in the health care industries in general and the State of West Bengal in particular.
Features.text4: To train and equip the public to become self-reliant in a dignified and civilized lifestyle so as to develop into good, healthy and progressive citizens.
Features.text5: To provide training on job oriented education well recognized by the respective industries in India and abroad.

Vission.paragraph1: We envision a society where education is acessible to all, regardless of socio-economic background.
Vission.text2: Our vision is to create a non-profit education trust that serves as a beacon of hopes for underserved communities.
Vission.text3: We strive to provide quality education that empower individuals and transforms lives.
Vission.text4: Our vision is to bridge the educational gap and ensure equal oppurtunities for every child.
Vission.text5: Our vision is to collabrate with commodities,stakeholders,and partners to build a strong educational eco-system.
Vission.text6: Our trust aspires to be acatalyst for positive change in the education landscape.
